00019 #include "Infection.h"
00020 #include "Strain.h"
00021 
00022 class Person;
00023 class Infection;
00024 class Strain;
00025 class Antiviral;
00026 class Antivirals;
00027 class AV_Manager;
00028 class AV_Health;
00029 class Vaccine;
00030 class Vaccine_Health;
00031 
00032 class Health {
00033 public:
00034   Health(Person * person);
00035   ~Health();
00036   void reset();
00037   void update(int day);
00038   void become_susceptible(int strain);
00039   void become_exposed(Infection *inf);
00040   void become_infectious(Strain * strain);
00041   void become_symptomatic(Strain *strain);
00042   void become_immune(Strain* strain);
00043   void declare_at_risk(Strain* strain);
00044   void recover(Strain * strain);
00045   int is_symptomatic() const;
00046   bool is_immune(Strain* strain) const { return immunity[strain->get_id()]; }
00047   bool is_at_risk(Strain* strain) const { return at_risk[strain->get_id()]; }
00048   char get_strain_status (int strain) const { return status[strain]; }
00049   Person* get_self() const { return self;}
00050   int get_num_strains() const { return strains; }
00051   int add_infectee(int strain);
00052   int get_exposure_date(int strain) const;
00053   int get_infectious_date(int strain) const;
00054   int get_recovered_date(int strain) const;
00055   int get_symptomatic_date(int strain) const;
00056   int get_infector(int strain) const;
00057   int get_infected_place(int strain) const;
00058   char get_infected_place_type(int strain) const;
00059   int get_infectees(int strain) const;  
00060   double get_susceptibility(int strain) const;
00061   double get_infectivity(int strain) const;
00062   Infection* get_infection(int strain) const { return infection[strain]; }
00063   bool is_on_av_for_strain(int day, int strain) const;
00064   
00065   //Medication operators
00066   void take(Vaccine *vacc, int day);
00067   void take(Antiviral *av, int day);
00068   int get_number_av_taken()             const { return av_health.size();}
00069   int get_checked_for_av(int s)             const { return checked_for_av[s]; }
00070   void flip_checked_for_av(int s) { checked_for_av[s] = 1; } 
00071   bool is_vaccinated() const { return vaccine_health.size(); }
00072   int get_number_vaccines_taken()        const { return vaccine_health.size();}
00073   AV_Health* get_av_health(int i)            const { return av_health[i];}
00074   Vaccine_Health* get_vaccine_health(int i)  const { return vaccine_health[i];}
00075   bool takes_av;
00076   bool takes_vaccine;
00077   
00078   //Modifiers
00079   void modify_susceptibility(int strain, double multp);
00080   void modify_infectivity(int strain, double multp);
00081         
00082   // Current day is needed to modify infectious period, because we can't cause this
00083   // infection to recover in the past.
00084   // Modifying infectious period is equivalent to modifying symptomatic and asymptomatic
00085   // periods by the same amount.
00086   void modify_infectious_period(int strain, double multp, int cur_day);
00087   void modify_symptomatic_period(int strain, double multp, int cur_day);
00088   void modify_asymptomatic_period(int strain, double multp, int cur_day);
00089   // Can't change develops_symptoms if this person is not asymptomatic ('i' or 'E')
00090   void modify_develops_symptoms(int strain, bool symptoms, int cur_day);
00091 
00092 private:
00093   void update_mutations(int day);
00094 
00095   Person * self;
00096   int strains;
00097   Infection ** infection;
00098   vector < bool > immunity;
00099   vector < bool > at_risk;      // Agent is/isn't at risk for severe complications
00100   double *susceptibility_multp;
00101   vector < bool > checked_for_av;
00102   vector < AV_Health * > av_health;
00103   vector < Vaccine_Health * > vaccine_health;
00104   char * status;
00105 
00106 protected:
00107   Health() { }
00108 };
